009package ImageAccessorDemos;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
013import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
014import imagingbook.common.image.access.ImageAccessor;
015import imagingbook.common.image.access.ScalarAccessor;
016
017/**
018 * This plugin demonstrates the of class {@link ScalarAccessor} for
019 * unified access to scalar-valued images.
020 * The plugin adds 20 brightness units to each pixel of the active image. 
021 * It can be applied to any scalar image type.
022 * TODO: move to other package
023 * 
024 * @author WB
025 *
026 * @see ImageAccessor
027 * @see ScalarAccessor
028 *
029 */
030public class ImageAccessor_Demo_Scalar implements PlugInFilter {
031
032        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus img) {
033                return DOES_8G + DOES_16 + DOES_32;
034        }
035
036        public void run(ImageProcessor ip) {
037                final int width = ip.getWidth();
038                final int height = ip.getHeight();
039                
040                ScalarAccessor ia = ScalarAccessor.create(ip, null, null);
041                
042                for (int u = 0; u < width; u++) {
043                        for (int v = 0; v < height; v++) {
044                                float val = ia.getVal(u, v);            // get a single value (float)
045                                ia.setVal(u, v, val  + 20);
046                        }
047                }
048        }
049
050}
